verses.roman:
'ca' evārthe--'munayaḥ eva' kṛṣṇere bhajaya
"ātmārāmā api"--'api' 'garhā'-artha kaya

synonyms: ca—the word ca; eva-arthe—in the sense of eva; munayaḥ eva—just the saintly persons; kṛṣṇere bhajaya—engage themselves in the devotional service of Lord Kṛṣṇa; ātmārāmāḥ api—also in this combination, ātmārāmā api; api—the word api; garhā-artha kaya—in the sense of censure.
translation: "The word ca is also used to indicate the certainty that only saintly persons are engaged in rendering devotional service to Kṛṣṇa. In the combination ātmārāmā api, api is used in the sense of censure.
